nodes.name: TwoPartyArbitrable

nodes.documentation:
@dev Indicate that a party has to pay a fee or would otherwise be considered as loosing.
 @param _party The party who has to pay.
nodes.name: HasToPayFee
payArbitrationFeeByPartyA

nodes.documentation:
@dev Pay the arbitration fee to raise a dispute. To be called by the party B. UNTRUSTED.
 Note that this function mirror payArbitrationFeeByPartyA.
nodes.name: payArbitrationFeeByPartyB

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) returns (function (uint256,bytes memory) payable external returns (uint256))

nodes.documentation:
@dev Create a dispute. UNTRUSTED.
 @param _arbitrationCost Amount to pay the arbitrator.
nodes.name: raiseDispute

nodes.documentation: @dev Reimburse partyA if partyB fails to pay the fee.
nodes.name: timeOutByPartyA

nodes.documentation: @dev Pay partyB if partyA fails to pay the fee.
nodes.name: timeOutByPartyB

nodes.documentation:
@dev Submit a reference to evidence. EVENT.
 @param _evidence A link to an evidence using its URI.
nodes.name: submitEvidence
appeal
executeRuling
